## Checklist

Before submitting this PR, please ensure:

- [ ] I have built the site locally using `hugo` or `hugo --minify`
- [ ] The site builds without errors
- [ ] I have run link-check locally or reviewed link-check results in CI
- [ ] All new and changed images have appropriate `alt` text
- [ ] Front matter is complete (title, summary, date, type, draft status)
- [ ] Navigation changes (if any) are intentional and match `.github/canonical/menus.yaml`
- [ ] No personal information, credentials, or secrets are included
- [ ] Changes are minimal and focused on the stated purpose
